_header: A man that should of truth tell
_description: Truth is unpopular: a carol — six quatrains and burden: ‘God be wit trewthe qwer he be / I wolde he were in this cuntre’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
A man þat xuld of trewþe telleWith grete lordys he may
                    not dwelle…
BLSl2593.Last Lines: …In the bosum of maryeFor there he is forsothe
